Introduction to Sociology

Overview

Subject area

Catalog Number

101

Course Title

Introduction to Sociology

Department(s)

Description

The student will demonstrate an understanding of the basic topic of sociology, including social mobility, role status, race and prejudice, and factors leading to social change.

Fall, Spring

Undergraduate
